title: Companion Approval Guide
content: N/A Ch'r'ai W'wargaz Crèche Y'llek - Inquisitorial Rooms With Inquisitor Ch'r'ai W'wargaz, do not give the Artifact and then win the persuasion check with Lae'zel Requirement/s: Succeed the Persuasion Check. Lae'zel + Shadowheart + Astarion + Gale + Ch'r'ai W'wargaz Crèche Y'llek - Inquisitorial Rooms Do not kneel before Vlaakith. Requirement/s: N/A Lae'zel - Vlaakith Crèche Y'llek - Inquisitorial Rooms Kneel before Vlaakith. Requirement/s: Lae'zel + Vlaakith Crèche Y'llek - Inquisitorial Rooms
